Articles.Content: Does anyone have (or know where I could get) the textures for the planet's surfaces from? I've tried using the 'natural' setting with ISA MapSat but I'd very much like the actual textures. I have the ones from Kerbin, the Mun and Minmus (from the wiki pages) but they're the only ones there.

You could try getting the grayscale with MapSat and artificially coloring it in photoshop or a similar program. That's what NASA used to do. Not sure if there's a way to just extract the texture from the game tho. Maybe try asking whoever put the textures on the wiki or try the kerbin geographical society or whatever its called here on the forums they'd probably know. Good luck and I look forward to seeing your results!
